VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: Nymph
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: Nymph psycasts are focused on instigating sex, one way or another.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: Nymps are psycasters known to bring sex to their comminuties. Known to arouse with but a few words, particularly powerful nymps can create great orgies.
